title: Musk Shakes Up Twitter’s Legal Team as He Looks to Cut More Costs
description: Twitter has stopped paying rent on offices and is considering not paying severance packages to former employees, among other measures.

title: FTX Chief: Company Appeared to Use ‘Old-Fashioned Embezzlement’
description: The man charged with recovering customer funds from the collapsed crypto exchange described an “unprecedented” lack of record keeping.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried and Schlubby Style
description: Sam Bankman-Fried’s choices may signal an end to the schlubby mystique.

title: Who Is John J. Ray III, FTX’s New Chief Executive?
description: Mr. Ray has been involved in picking up the pieces of several prominent corporate failures — the most famous being the collapse of Enron.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried Arrested in the Bahamas After US Prosecutors File Charges
description: A statement by the government of the Bahamas said Mr. Bankman-Fried was arrested after prosecutors in the United States filed criminal charges.

title: Nuclear Fusion Energy Breakthrough: Video and How to Watch
description: The Energy Department on Tuesday morning will present “a major scientific breakthrough” achieved at Lawrence Livermore National Laboratory.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Parents Under Scrutiny in FTX Collapse
description: The FTX founder Sam Bankman-Fried’s mother and father, who teach at Stanford Law School, are under scrutiny for their connections to their son’s crypto business.
